ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | 0nghm.2 | |- V = ( Base ` S ) |
| 2 |  | 0nghm.3 | |- .0. = ( 0g ` T ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( S normOp T ) = ( S normOp T ) |
| 4 | 3, 1, 2 | #P_nmo0 | |- ( ( S e. NrmGrp /\ T e. NrmGrp ) -> ( ( S normOp T ) ` ( V X. { .0. } ) ) = 0 ) |
| 5 |  | #P_0re | |- 0 e. RR |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_syl6eqel | |- ( ( S e. NrmGrp /\ T e. NrmGrp ) -> ( ( S normOp T ) ` ( V X. { .0. } ) ) e. RR ) |
| 7 |  | #P_ngpgrp | |- ( S e. NrmGrp -> S e. Grp ) |
| 8 |  | #P_ngpgrp | |- ( T e. NrmGrp -> T e. Grp ) |
| 9 | 2, 1 | #P_0ghm | |- ( ( S e. Grp /\ T e. Grp ) -> ( V X. { .0. } ) e. ( S GrpHom T ) ) |
| 10 | 7, 8, 9 | #P_syl2an | |- ( ( S e. NrmGrp /\ T e. NrmGrp ) -> ( V X. { .0. } ) e. ( S GrpHom T ) ) |
| 11 | 3 | #P_isnghm2 | |- ( ( S e. NrmGrp /\ T e. NrmGrp /\ ( V X. { .0. } ) e. ( S GrpHom T ) ) -> ( ( V X. { .0. } ) e. ( S NGHom T ) <-> ( ( S normOp T ) ` ( V X. { .0. } ) ) e. RR ) ) |
| 12 | 10, 11 | #P_mpd3an3 | |- ( ( S e. NrmGrp /\ T e. NrmGrp ) -> ( ( V X. { .0. } ) e. ( S NGHom T ) <-> ( ( S normOp T ) ` ( V X. { .0. } ) ) e. RR ) ) |
| 13 | 6, 12 | #P_mpbird | |- ( ( S e. NrmGrp /\ T e. NrmGrp ) -> ( V X. { .0. } ) e. ( S NGHom T ) ) |
